q: n't heard: Did Eric Schmidt jump ship, or was he forced to walk the plank? He Jumped Eric Schmidt has`` career aspirations outside of Google,'' says Bianca Bosker at The Huffington Post. Some speculate Eric Schmidt will remain executive chairman only temporarily before pursuing a career in the public sector, a field in which he has previously demonstrated interest. She quotes Google biographer Ken Auletta who says`` he jumped'' and`` won't stay that long'' at the company. He Was Pushed Eric Schmidt stepping down creates a`` huge advantage'' for Google, writes

, but rivals are nipping at its heels. The Chrysler Town and Country was the top-selling minivan in the U.S. last year, with sales of 112,275, or about 4,000 more than the Honda Odyssey. We are not going to give up one inch of territory, Sergio Marchionne said. Chrysler said the 2011 versions of its minivans have a new V-6 engine with improved fuel economy. of Evansville political science professor. If Mike Pence is to encounter any bumps at all, they could come early, as he shifts his focus from federal to state issues, Robert Dion said. In some cases, it can be an awkward transition, to go from being a lawmaker to an executive, and to go from the federal level to the state level. There's going to be that transition that might have a few hiccups to it, he said.`` But he's familiar with all the issues, he's an energetic campaigner, he's got solid conservative credentials, he knows how to raise money.'' On a more practical note, Google's change could be designed to erase memories of some awkward statements made recently by its outgoing CEO, writes CNNMoney.com.`` Eric Schmidt 's public image took some hits after a string of verbal gaffes.'' But Steve- who'll be live on the red carpet at this weekend's Baftas for the E! Entertainment channel- stayed tight-lipped about whether he was set to join Simon Cowell for the Stateside show. I've spoken to numerous people and all I'll say about it is it's a job I really, really want and I'd love to do. I don't want to go in depth all about it because I think that's a foolish thing to do. It's just a thing I want to do and we'll see in time, he said.:: Steve Jones will host Live From The Red Carpet: The 2011 Baftas on Sunday at 5pm on E! Entertainment Television. . Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer raised the issue of piracy directly to Hu Jintao at a meeting with chief executives, according to Barack Obama 's account of the talks. Hu Jintao said he and Barack Obama agreed to work toward a cooperative partnership based on mutual respect and mutual benefit and that`` a lot still needs to be done in China in terms of human rights.'' POLITICO's op-ed pages, comparing Mike Pence 's possible presidential bid to Ronald Reagan in 1980: The issues facing the Republican Party today look close to identical to the primary campaign between Ronald Reagan and George H.W.
